name: HexTex
description:
HexTex is a top down mech shooter that will feature a wide verity of characters who will all have there own 4 mission campaigns.

Along with this there will be an online VS mode and a Co-Op survival mode for players to use these characters within.

This build is a test of that concept, to see if players will still play top down shooter games.

In this build there is simply a 2 minute survival mode with 4 enemy types and 2 characters to pick from. There are also 4 different weapons you can collect.

All feedback is welcome!

Coming next build:

  • Leaderboard
  • Character verity
  • Mission testing
